mapper.insert: insert into propensity(pno, userid, pcase, h_noise, h_pattern, h_pet, h_petwith, h_smoke, h_mood, h_communication, h_party, h_enter, h_support, h_etc, m_pattern, m_personality, m_pet, m_smoke, m_age, m_gender, m_global, m_now, pdate) values(psq.nextval, #{userid}, 'm', #{h_noise}, #{h_pattern}, #{h_pet}, #{h_petwith}, #{h_smoke}, #{h_mood}, #{h_communication}, #{h_party}, #{h_enter}, #{h_support}, #{h_etc}, #{m_pattern}, #{m_personality}, #{m_pet}, #{m_smoke}, #{m_age}, #{m_gender}, #{m_global}, #{m_now}, sysdate)
